content: WASHINGTON  Jan 19 West Elm  a unit of home furnishings company Williams-Sonoma Inc  is recalling about 6 100 Saddle bar and counter stools because the legs can break  the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission said on Tuesday.
name: Williams-Sonoma Inc
title: Williams-Sonoma unit recalls bar stools over fall risk
